name: List Files
info:
# List files

Will list files in a directory.

Path can be set in `msg.payload` or by setting the `DIRECTORY` environment variable.

Extensions can be filtered by settings the `EXTENSIONS` environment variable to an Array of extensions.

name: Reset
The File Upload Page
format: Drag and Drop your PDF file to upload

name: Main filter
Take to the File upload page
func:
msg.payload = {"group":{"hide":["Recrutio_Home_page","Recrutio_Login","Recrutio_Registration","Recrutio_DS","Recrutio_WB","Recrutio_GD","Recrutio_BC","Recrutio_Final"],"show":["Recrutio_File_upload"]}};
return msg;

name: Empty the text bar
func:
msg.payload = "";
return msg;

name: Rename the Payload
Set email
Set Global Variables
If Not Null
From registration go to login page
If login not found goto registration
If Null
func:
msg.payload = "No records found. You are being redirected to the Registration Page.";
return msg;

name: To Display the Status
func:
msg.payload = "Hey! "+ msg.payload.Name + " Registration successful. You will be redirected shortly."
return msg;

name: drop resumes
format:
